BoundKeyFallback: Key this widget is bound to set directly in blueprint. Used when we want to reference a specific key instead of an action.
InputTypeOverride: Allows us to set the input type explicitly for the keybind widget.
IsHoldKeybindValue: Whether or not this keybind widget is currently set to be a hold keybind
bShowUnboundStatus: Should this keybinding widget display information that it is currently unbound?
KeyBindTextFont: The font to apply at each size
CountdownTextFont: The font to apply at each size
PercentageMaterialParameterName: The material parameter name for hold percentage in the HoldKeybindImage
AxisScale: Scale to read when using an axis Mapping
PresetNameOverride: Allows us to set the preset name explicitly for the keybind widget.
ForcedHoldKeybindStatus: Setting that can show this keybind as a hold or never show it as a hold (even if it is)
BoundKey: Derived Key this widget is bound to

methods.name: IsHoldKeybind
methods.doc: Get whether this keybind is a hold action.

methods.name: SetAxisScale
methods.doc: Set the axis scale value for this keybind

methods.name: SetBoundAction
methods.doc: Set the bound action for our keybind

methods.name: SetBoundKey
methods.doc: Set the bound key for our keybind

methods.name: SetForcedHoldKeybindStatus
methods.doc: Force this keybind to be a hold keybind

methods.name: SetPresetNameOverride
methods.doc: Set the preset name override value for this keybind.

methods.name: SetShowProgressCountDown
methods.doc: Force this keybind to be a hold keybind

methods.name: UpdateKeybindWidget
methods.doc: Update the key and associated display based on our current Boundaction
